name: cca-delegate
description: Chrome Mobile Apps command delegate for using in programmatically on gulp/Grunt plug-ins

scripts.test: xo && rm -rf test/tmp && mkdir -p test/tmp && ava --serial ./test/test-gadget.js ./test/test-conf.js ./test/test-platform.js ./test/test-build.js ./test/test-package.js
scripts.test:run: xo && rm -rf test/tmp && mkdir -p test/tmp && PLATFORM=chrome ava --serial ./test/test-conf.js ./test/test-platform.js ./test/test-run.js
